item.description: Explore how tapping deep geothermal reservoirs across the U.S. can phase out fossil‚Äëfuel pipelines and feed next‚Äëgeneration undersea HVDC interconnectors for a resilient, carbon‚Äëfree national grid.

item.title: Pedal to Power: The Peloton That Charges Your World

item.title: Kinetic Gym: Where Gains Light the Grid

item.title: Small Blades, Big Change: The Micro Windmill Revolution
item.description: Why build giant windmills in remote deserts when we can fill our neighborhoods with beautiful, modular, and functional wind art? Micro and medium windmills could be the foundation of a decentralized energy grid‚Äîand the canvas for a new generation of civic creativity.
